response.overview: Featuring coverage of the major street-truck events and shows from California to Florida and a half-dozen points in between, this action-packed video dishes up boffo babes and a sizzling soundtrack along with roaring road monsters. Highlights include the latest creations in light trucks, dragging on Interstate 10 in Louisiana and a burnout competition. Among the extras are behind-the-scenes footage, a photo gallery and two music videos.
response.title: Mayhem: Redemption
